Accidents is a **death cause category**. It means that it is a collection of **death causes** and so one can compute the probability of dying from this death cause category by adding up all of its death causes. 

#### Death causes

Accidents consists of the following causes

* [Other accidents](/model/OtherAccidents)
* [Transport](/model/Transport)

#### Categories

Accidents is itself part of the following death cause categories

* [Violent death](/model/ViolentDeath)

#### Risk factors

Accidents has no [risk factors](/model/intro#risk-factor) in the model (yet).
